alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Oahu North Shore (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 18 at 3:31PM HST until December 19 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR THE EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR THE NORTH FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .Surf along exposed east facing shores remains above the warning threshold as a large long-period northeast (40 degrees) swell moves through the area. The northeast swell will also keep surf at exposed north facing shores above the advisory threshold. Surf should drop below the warning threshold late tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Surf 10 to 15 feet along north facing shores. * WHERE...North facing shores of Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui, and Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Oahu North Shore
